duties_responsibilities.duty: Source debt and raise equity for real estate transactions
Understand and navigate the underwriting process
Value multifamily real estate deals accurately
Raise capital through syndications, family offices, institutional funds, insurance companies' debt funds, and local/regional banks
Leverage knowledge of HUD, Fannie Mae, and Freddie Mac loan programs

education_certification.credential: Minimum 5 years of experience in sourcing debt and raising equity for real estate transactions, Series 63 license as well as the Series 82 and Series 22, or Series 7 license
